com.microsoft.windowsazure.services.media.entityoperations

Class DefaultActionOperation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.windowsazure.services.media.entityoperations.DefaultActionOperation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntityActionOperation, EntityOperation
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EntityLinkOperation

    public class DefaultActionOperation
extends java.lang.Object
implements EntityActionOperation
    Generic implementation of Delete operation usable by most entities.
